titlestmt.titleproper: A Guide to the Ford Foundation records, Programs FA1711

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2022-01-01 04:05:24 -0500.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Records more than 10 years old are open for research, unless otherwise noted. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Divisions or program areas include, but are not limited to: Africa and the Middle East; Asia, the Art Purchase program; Arts and Humanities; Asset Building and Community Develoment program (ASSETS); Behavioral Sciences; Catalogued Reports; Communications; Democracy Rights and Justice; Developing Countries program; Economic Development and Administration; Education and Culture; Governance and Public Policy; Higher Education and Research Division; Human Rights and Governance; Humanities and the Arts; the International Division; Knowledge, Creativity and Freedom; Leadership Development; Latin America and the Caribbean; the National Affairs Division; Overseas Development; Peace and Social Justice; Population; Public Broadcasting; Reproductive Health and Population; the United States International Affairs program; and Urban Poverty.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Arranged in collections by program, file type, or originating officer. Additional finding aids are created as records are processed and open for research.
